> [@joedownloads1](https://github.com/joedownloads1) But we use another type of rules to block popups here. Is AdGuard detected on https://adguard.com/test.html ? Or the problem is solved?

Yes problem is solved. 

ok so i had a static ip address and configured it so my modem gives it a static ip and not my windows computer. Now it's working.. Thank you for your time

issue.title: Organizing the many rules for op.gg
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There is an `op.gg` section.
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/6d0b94df8ffe1b13ec0b7eecdf98f22ecee12ee0/BaseFilter/sections/specific.txt#L19256
I believe it should move the rules there.

Additionally, `na.op.gg` redirects to `op.gg`, so I believe it should remove `na` from the rule.
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/6d0b94df8ffe1b13ec0b7eecdf98f22ecee12ee0/BaseFilter/sections/specific.txt#L665

 

### Proposed solution

move the rules and remove `na` from the rule.

### Additional information

comment.body:
Not reproduced with AdGuard filters on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.38.0

  • Add MD059/descriptive-link-text
  • Improve MD025/MD027/MD036/MD038/MD041/MD043/MD045/MD051/MD052
  • markdown-it parser no longer a production dependency (breaking change)
    • Add markdownItFactory option, remove markdownItPlugins option
  • Remove support for end-of-life Node version 18
  • Improve performance
  • Update dependencies
Commits
  • 224987d Update to version 0.38.0.
  • 8cb8f6c Bump @​eslint/js from 9.25.1 to 9.26.0
  • a1506e7 Bump eslint from 9.25.1 to 9.26.0
  • b393508 Bump ava from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0
  • 738f4aa Update test repo snapshots.
  • 979419c Remove support for end-of-life Node 18 (continued).
  • 4d8e79d Remove support for end-of-life Node 18 (continued).
  • 6adfaf6 Update MD025/single-title and MD051/link-fragments to ignore headings that ex...
  • a4b7ffa Remove support for end-of-life Node 18.
  • f34f4dd Update Checkers workflow to ignore all github.com links because they return H...
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.37.4&new-version=0.38.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Recommendations for Adguard Chinese filters
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

在Adguard浏览器扩展中有好几个与中文相关的过滤器，我觉得可以合并成一个过滤器。目前Adguard中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以合并其它过滤器。

### Proposed solution

如图，下面这两个过滤器也是负责中文内容的，可以与Adguard 中文过滤器合并。现在的中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以改成同时基于三个过滤器
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/97d933a4-38aa-4fee-a15c-1fa5eaab4307)

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
> 你好。不明白这个想法。请解释一下。

adguard中文过滤器是基于easylistchina规则列表的，在easylistchina的基础上加上你们自己的规则组合而成。但是adguard广告过滤扩展中还含有另外两个负责中文内容的广告过滤器，分别是截图中的两个过滤器。我的建议就是将图中的两个过滤器与easylistchina再加上你们自己的规则，组成adguard中文过滤器

issue.title: Recommendations for Adguard Chinese filters
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

在Adguard浏览器扩展中有好几个与中文相关的过滤器，我觉得可以合并成一个过滤器。目前Adguard中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以合并其它过滤器。

### Proposed solution

如图，下面这两个过滤器也是负责中文内容的，可以与Adguard 中文过滤器合并。现在的中文过滤器是基于Easylist china的，可以改成同时基于三个过滤器
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/97d933a4-38aa-4fee-a15c-1fa5eaab4307)

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
It has been fixed 5 days ago, but MV3 extension cannot update filters, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension update.
Until then, please add following rule to user rules:
```adblock
||statbest.in/jwplayer.mp4
||statbest.in/wbdrma/hdg.php
||statbest.in/jwplayer-*/vast.js$script,redirect=noopjs,domain=webdramaturkey.org
webdramaturkey.org#$##vast > div[id].jwplayer { display: none !important; }
webdramaturkey.org#$##vast > div[id].jwplayer + iframe.embed-responsive-item { display: block !important; }
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

They continue to fight back because the four ads are visible.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://www.behance.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.behance.net%2F) ### Comment > **Title:** > AdGuard Parental Controls Stop Blocking After Browser Extension Removal (Arc Browser on Windows) > > **Describe the bug** > AdGuard Parental Controls have stopped blocking websites on my blocklist. This issue began shortly after I installed and then removed the AdGuard browser extension on the Arc Browser (which is Chromium-based). The app’s settings appear correct, but the blocklist is not being enforced. > > **Steps to reproduce** > 1. Install AdGuard app on Windows PC > 2. Enable Parental Controls and add websites to the blocklist > 3. Install AdGuard browser extension on Arc Browser > 4. Remove the AdGuard browser extension > 5. Attempt to access a website that should be blocked > > **Expected behavior** > Websites added to the Parental Controls blocklist should remain inaccessible, regardless of the browser extension status. > > **Actual behavior** > Websites on the blocklist are accessible without restriction. > > - **Reinstallation:** Reinstalling the AdGuard app did not fix the issue > - **Not account-related:** Parental Controls work correctly on my laptop with the same account and settings > > **Additional context** > - The issue seems isolated to my PC. > - I suspect the browser extension may have altered settings that interfere with DNS filtering or parental control enforcement. > - Other AdGuard protections (e.g., DNS filtering) still appear to function normally—only the Parental Controls blocklist is affected. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4p99la6y6ku8kkscsgc4gow0gkcc0cc4sc7mvq6gly.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/60k2htzmi9og8gs4wcgg04sc8g0c0c0n7segcpi7es.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/21av4nh8zvr48w44coko04sskkcskckrl2gcse7m40.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ivlhk0rlvv480okssookos84sswgscwk5jfmxalf40.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 System version: | Windows 11, version 24H2 Browser: | Arc Browser AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://www.behance.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.behance.net%2F) ### Comment > **Title:** > AdGuard Parental Controls Stop Blocking After Browser Extension Removal (Arc Browser on Windows) > > **Describe the bug** > AdGuard Parental Controls have stopped blocking websites on my blocklist. This issue began shortly after I installed and then removed the AdGuard browser extension on the Arc Browser (which is Chromium-based). The app’s settings appear correct, but the blocklist is not being enforced. > > **Steps to reproduce** > 1. Install AdGuard app on Windows PC > 2. Enable Parental Controls and add websites to the blocklist > 3. Install AdGuard browser extension on Arc Browser > 4. Remove the AdGuard browser extension > 5. Attempt to access a website that should be blocked > > **Expected behavior** > Websites added to the Parental Controls blocklist should remain inaccessible, regardless of the browser extension status. > > **Actual behavior** > Websites on the blocklist are accessible without restriction. > > - **Reinstallation:** Reinstalling the AdGuard app did not fix the issue > - **Not account-related:** Parental Controls work correctly on my laptop with the same account and settings > > **Additional context** > - The issue seems isolated to my PC. > - I suspect the browser extension may have altered settings that interfere with DNS filtering or parental control enforcement. > - Other AdGuard protections (e.g., DNS filtering) still appear to function normally—only the Parental Controls blocklist is affected. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4p99la6y6ku8kkscsgc4gow0gkcc0cc4sc7mvq6gly.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/60k2htzmi9og8gs4wcgg04sc8g0c0c0n7segcpi7es.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/21av4nh8zvr48w44coko04sskkcskckrl2gcse7m40.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ivlhk0rlvv480okssookos84sswgscwk5jfmxalf40.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 System version: | Windows 11, version 24H2 Browser: | Arc Browser AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://www.behance.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.behance.net%2F) ### Comment > **Title:** > AdGuard Parental Controls Stop Blocking After Browser Extension Removal (Arc Browser on Windows) > > **Describe the bug** > AdGuard Parental Controls have stopped blocking websites on my blocklist. This issue began shortly after I installed and then removed the AdGuard browser extension on the Arc Browser (which is Chromium-based). The app’s settings appear correct, but the blocklist is not being enforced. > > **Steps to reproduce** > 1. Install AdGuard app on Windows PC > 2. Enable Parental Controls and add websites to the blocklist > 3. Install AdGuard browser extension on Arc Browser > 4. Remove the AdGuard browser extension > 5. Attempt to access a website that should be blocked > > **Expected behavior** > Websites added to the Parental Controls blocklist should remain inaccessible, regardless of the browser extension status. > > **Actual behavior** > Websites on the blocklist are accessible without restriction. > > - **Reinstallation:** Reinstalling the AdGuard app did not fix the issue > - **Not account-related:** Parental Controls work correctly on my laptop with the same account and settings > > **Additional context** > - The issue seems isolated to my PC. > - I suspect the browser extension may have altered settings that interfere with DNS filtering or parental control enforcement. > - Other AdGuard protections (e.g., DNS filtering) still appear to function normally—only the Parental Controls blocklist is affected. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4p99la6y6ku8kkscsgc4gow0gkcc0cc4sc7mvq6gly.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/60k2htzmi9og8gs4wcgg04sc8g0c0c0n7segcpi7es.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/21av4nh8zvr48w44coko04sskkcskckrl2gcse7m40.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ivlhk0rlvv480okssookos84sswgscwk5jfmxalf40.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 System version: | Windows 11, version 24H2 Browser: | Arc Browser AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:

issue.title: Replace only `$stealth` exceptions with specific options
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

In https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt, there are many rules that completely disable Stealth Mode, although almost every time it requires to disable one or two options.

### Proposed solution

Recheck old rules with `$stealth` exceptions without specific options and add options where it is possible.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment > 1) Голосові дзвінки Messenger при включеному AdGuard обриваються (автоматично вимикаються ніби хтось поклав трубку) через 2-3 секунди після початку розмови. При вимкненому AdGuard дзвінки Messenger відбуваються нормально. Цей баг працює постійно > 2)При включеному AdGuard час від часу (не завжди, 2-3 рази на день) перестає вантажитись стрічка Facebook, а також розділ "сповіщення" (той що з дзвіночком). При цьому Messenger та шапка сайту провантажуються нормально. В месенджері можна спілкуватись, але не голосом. За межами цих 2-3 разів на день стрічка та панель сповіщень вантажаться нормально. > Обидві проблеми почалися одночасно, близько 1,5-2 тижнів тому, до того все було нормально. Нічого в налаштуваннях не змінювалось, нових програм не встановлювалось. Вмикання чи вимикання Adblock Plus ніяким чином на ситуацію не впливає. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1u8hzj3b3uhw0w4k4k8cwsg0oskskko1387a9nzqe3.jpg?nc=1)

Bump markdownlint from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0 (#204589)

Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0.
- [Changelog](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/compare/v0.37.4...v0.38.0)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: markdownlint
  dependency-version: 0.38.0
  dependency-type: direct:development
  update-type: version-update:semver-minor
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>
Co-authored-by: dependabot[bot] <49699333+dependabot[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>

pull_request.title: Bump markdownlint from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0
pull_request.body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.37.4 to 0.38.0.
Changelog

Sourced from markdownlint's changelog.

0.38.0

  • Add MD059/descriptive-link-text
  • Improve MD025/MD027/MD036/MD038/MD041/MD043/MD045/MD051/MD052
  • markdown-it parser no longer a production dependency (breaking change)
    • Add markdownItFactory option, remove markdownItPlugins option
  • Remove support for end-of-life Node version 18
  • Improve performance
  • Update dependencies
Commits
  • 224987d Update to version 0.38.0.
  • 8cb8f6c Bump @​eslint/js from 9.25.1 to 9.26.0
  • a1506e7 Bump eslint from 9.25.1 to 9.26.0
  • b393508 Bump ava from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0
  • 738f4aa Update test repo snapshots.
  • 979419c Remove support for end-of-life Node 18 (continued).
  • 4d8e79d Remove support for end-of-life Node 18 (continued).
  • 6adfaf6 Update MD025/single-title and MD051/link-fragments to ignore headings that ex...
  • a4b7ffa Remove support for end-of-life Node 18.
  • f34f4dd Update Checkers workflow to ignore all github.com links because they return H...
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot commands and options
